text: Antimonide is an ion. Its chemical formula is Sb3-. It has antimony in its -3 oxidation state. Antimonides are reducing agents. They react with acids to make stibine. Many antimonides have properties between a salt and an alloy. Many transition metal and post-transition metal antimonides are semiconductors. ==Related pages== *Nitride *Phosphide Category:Antimony compounds Category:Anions
title: Antimonide
